name: Hyper Sonic Boom - Run, Jump and Fly
name_original: Hyper Sonic Boom - Run, Jump and Fly
description:
Hyper Sonic Boom - Run, Jump and Fly is a FREE and fun adventure game!

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Tap to Jump, double tap for double jump - make the hyper sonic boom fly!

Get as far as possible and collect coins - that will give extra points to be on the top of the leaderboard! Invite friends to play for double fun!

Help the hyper sonic boom to jump with just an easy touch.

Hyper Sonic Boom - Run, Jump and Fly is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!
